backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with data types, authorization mixins, storage integration, and state variables for files, folders, notes, missions, and upload tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of the 'MyGallery' header text and listing involved files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains summarized descriptions of major frontend components, hooks, and utilities covering app structure, UI behavior, and file management workflows.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documents creation of a Draft baseline identical to Live version 114, including verification steps, parity checks, and change‑control rules.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up PWA metadata, icons, root div, and service worker registration.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Defines a post‑restoration change freeze, listing prohibited modifications and requiring explicit user approval for any further changes.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest describing app metadata, start URL, icons, and display configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, cache cleanup, and offline fallback logic.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Provides a checklist and troubleshooting guide for verifying PWA installability requirements, including manifest, service worker, and icon validation.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming the frontend was restored to match Live version 114, verifying app structure, authentication flows, components, styling, and utilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application wrapper configuring themes, React Query, providers, and rendering HomePage with intro and upload runner.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: Displays a detailed error screen for actor initialization failures with retry, logout, and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated gallery icon with hover effects and target-style graphics.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed bottom horizontal decorative line across the screen.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a browser blocks opening a file, offering retry and download actions.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog for previewing files with support for multiple media types and actions like open, download, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Component handling file, link, and note uploads with concurrency control and speech-to-text integration.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders view with optional pulse and overlay behavior.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog for creating, renaming, selecting, and deleting folders.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full-screen folders interface enabling creation, editing, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright text and link attribution.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Provides a full-screen file viewer with swipe navigation, download, delete, share, move, and external-open handling.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files and notes in a gallery with selection, preview, actions, and folder/mission management.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with theme toggle, auth menu, and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/HomeSharedElemen: Implements shared-element transition animations between home sections using DOMRects.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a timed splash screen with a fading animated icon before main UI loads.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link cannot be opened, offering retry and copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button triggering Internet Identity login with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission detail view handling tasks, autosave, attached files/notes, and viewer dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title and tasks, including task add/remove/toggle and mission submission.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions view, with optional disabled and pulse states.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full‑screen missions view with tabs, mission list, delete confirmation, and navigation to mission details or creation.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper layout that restricts content to mobile‑only containers.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving selected files or notes into a chosen mission, with loading and success handling.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog showing a note’s title and body with actions to download, share, move, or delete the note.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving or removing files and notes to or from folders, including performance diagnostics.
Interactive swipeable row component that reveals edit/delete actions and handles drag gestures.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a global progress bar summarizing all active uploads with item counts and total percentage.
frontend/src/components/UploadQueueRunne: Restores persisted uploads and processes them with concurrency limits, updating progress and completion state.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with a target-themed graphic and text, prompting users to sign in via a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages backend actor initialization, retries, error handling, and exposes actor state and sign-out logic.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Tracks file, link, and note uploads, providing progress updates, completion handling, and item restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor tied to the user identity, initializing access control and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, files, missions, and notes once when the backend actor and identity are ready. Resets prefetch state on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes a hook for consuming identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntroOnAppResume.t: Calls a callback when the app regains focus or becomes visible, but only after identity is initialized and authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer such as touch and updates on media query changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Debounces and queues mission title/task updates, performing autosaves only when data changes and handling mission switching. Manages pending saves and mutation coordination.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions with sorting, invalidation, and actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Supplies React Query hooks for fetching and mutating notes in folders, missions, or root with concurrency‑limited creation and targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating files and folders through a backend actor with readiness checks and caching settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements a speech-to-text hook using the browser SpeechRecognition API with real-time transcripts and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark mode CSS variables for colors, themes, and layout styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main home page with authentication checks, data prefetching, UI state for folders/missions, and optional dev smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines standardized actor initialization error messages and helper functions for classifying backend initialization errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides utilities for opening external URLs, downloading files or notes, and sharing files via Web Share API with visibility-based popup detection.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytesWorkerSingle: Manages a singleton web worker to read file bytes with concurrency control, request queuing, and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type, including viewer, download, or office preview behaviors.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies files by MIME type for preview support and provides human-readable type labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Calculates mission progress, checks mission completion, and splits missions into incomplete and completed groups.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Compares two task arrays safely with BigInt task IDs for equality.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements optional performance diagnostics with timing, logging, and async operation measurement.
Implements an IndexedDB-backed upload queue storing file bytes, metadata, progress, and completion state.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs React Query mutation phases in development for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development smoke tests for folder, mission, link, and note creation via backend calls and formats results.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Provides concurrency limiters for async tasks, including a cancellable version with stats and queue management.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/workers/fileBytes.worker.ts: Web worker that reads file bytes off-thread and returns metadata or an error response.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, radius, animations, and theme settings with custom CSS variables.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Lists all frontend files that define the canonical v114 baseline structure for verification.
project_state.json: Project state file defining metadata, existing features, and a pending request to remove the 'MyGallery' header text.
